    56	class Llama4MoE(nn.Module):
    57	
    58	    @torch.compile(dynamic=True, backend=get_compiler_backend())
    59	    @staticmethod
    60	    def custom_routing_function(
    61	        hidden_states: torch.Tensor,
    62	        gating_output: torch.Tensor,
    63	        topk: int,
    64	        renormalize: bool,
    65	    ) -> Tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]:
    66	        router_scores_aK, router_indices_aK = fast_topk(gating_output, topk, dim=-1)
    67	        router_scores_aK = torch.sigmoid(router_scores_aK.float()).to(
    68	            hidden_states.dtype
    69	        )
    70	        return (
    71	            router_scores_aK.view(-1).reshape(router_scores_aK.shape),
    72	            router_indices_aK.to(torch.int32),
    73	        )
